cab.content: (This Document is the Proper?His Britannic Majesty's Cov^ Circulated by the Secretary of State for India. /SECRET.I t^T^/ I ?Vo?n Viceroy, Foreign Department, I9i7i Marc/j 1918.(Received at 7.30 p.ni.);^^k^s^ecret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. Baluchistan. For ^ Mari rising see separate Army Department telegrams. Jhalawan Mengal Sardar murdered with four headmen on 8th March by malcontent Mengals.
